sentences.sContent: Virtually all the children come to school by bus.
sentences.sCn: 几乎所有的孩子都乘公交车上学。

sentences.sContent: He was virtually unknown before running for office.
sentences.sCn: 他在参加竞选之前几乎不为人知。

sentences.sContent: ...Boundaries exist in virtually all human relationships...
...Back in the 1950s most of us grew up in households where Morn cooked virtually every night...
...upon which virtually all aspects of37society now depend...
...organic cotton and non-organic cotton are virtually indistinguishable once woven into a dress...

words.tran: [计] 虚拟的；有效的；实质上的，事实上的
